statements: UPDATE course_schedule SET instructor_name = 'John Doe', start_time = '2022-10-01 10:00:00', end_time = '2022-10-01 12:00:00' WHERE course_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE course_schedule SET day_of_week = 'Tuesday', course_name = 'Intermediate Math', instructor_name = 'Alice Smith' WHERE course_id = '87654321-12d3-45a6-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE course_schedule SET end_time = '2023-03-15 14:30:00' WHERE course_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000' AND instructor_name = 'John Doe';
UPDATE course_schedule SET start_time = '2023-03-20 09:00:00', day_of_week = 'Monday' WHERE course_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440001';
UPDATE Course SET course_name='Math', course_credits=4 WHERE course_id=1;
UPDATE Timetable SET day_of_week='Monday', start_time='09:00:00', end_time='10:30:00', room_id=101 WHERE timetable_id=1;
UPDATE Course SET course_description = 'New description', course_credits = 4 WHERE course_id = 101;
UPDATE Timetable SET day_of_week = 'Monday', start_time = '09:00:00', end_time = '12:00:00', room_id = 201 WHERE timetable_id = 201;
UPDATE Course SET course_name = 'New Course Name', course_credit = 4 WHERE course_id = 1;
UPDATE Student SET student_name = 'John Doe', student_email = 'johndoe@example.com' WHERE student_id = 2;
UPDATE Course SET course_credit = 4, course_description = 'Updated course description' WHERE course_id = 1;
UPDATE Student SET student_name = 'John Doe', student_email = 'john.doe@example.com' WHERE student_id = 3;
UPDATE course SET course_name = 'Mathematics', course_description = 'Algebra and Calculus', course_credits = 4 WHERE course_id = 101;
UPDATE course SET course_credits = 3, course_name = 'Physics', course_description = 'Mechanics and Thermodynamics' WHERE course_id = 102;
UPDATE course SET course_credits = 4, course_description = 'Advanced course on Database Design' WHERE course_id = 101;
UPDATE course SET course_name = 'Deep Learning Fundamentals', course_credits = 3 WHERE course_id = 102;
UPDATE course SET course_name = 'Database Management' WHERE course_id = 1;
UPDATE instructor SET instructor_name = 'John Doe', instructor_email = 'john.doe@example.com' WHERE instructor_id = 3;
UPDATE course SET course_credit = 4 WHERE course_id = 101
UPDATE student SET student_program = 'Computer Science' WHERE student_id = 201
